channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Youzify – BuddyPress Community, User Profile, Social Network & Membership Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Youzify – BuddyPress Community, User Profile, Social Network & Membership Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-1950|2024-08-03T00:24:43.422Z -- unknown -- youzify%20%E2%80%93%20buddypress%20community%2C%20user%20profile%2C%20social%20network%20%26%20membership%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Youzify WordPress plugin before 1.2.0 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement via an AJAX action available to unauthenticated users, leading to an unauthenticated SQL injection
